markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Dread Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=526)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Aura" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=206" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Fear" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=68" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 406 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 30-foot-radius emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You emit an aura of terror. Foes in the area are [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) and unable to reduce the condition.
name: Dread Aura

summary_markdown: You emit an aura of terror.
text: Dread Aura Source Core Rulebook pg. 406 4.0 Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Area 30-foot-radius emanation Duration sustained up to 1 minute --- You emit an aura of terror. Foes in the area are frightened 1 and unable to reduce the condition.
